hero.description: If you're building a software product, writing the code is only half the job. You also need to run and maintain it for every customer—fast, secure, and reliable 24/7. That takes time, specialized skills, and real budget.
hero.descriptionHighlight:
Get back to focusing 100% on your product.
We'll handle CloudSecOps, for less than the cost of a single hire.

services.title: What is KumoOps – CloudSecOps as a Service?
services.description: We offer a tailored solution that combines our expertise in cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and software development. Our team works closely with you to understand your needs and develop a customized solution.
services.cloudSecOpsTeamDesc: You decide which parts we should take care of and for how long.
services.flexibilityDesc: All major cloud providers supported. Source code always belongs to you.
services.reliabilityDesc: SLAs, privacy measures, security requirements – we handle it all.
services.step01Desc: We understand your current cloud infrastructure and goals.
services.step02Desc: We set up and manage your cloud infrastructure for optimal performance.
services.step03Desc: We create and maintain pipelines for fast, efficient deployments.
services.step04Desc: Continuous monitoring and optimization of your cloud resources.

benefits.title: Benefits of KumoOps
benefits.subtitle: Focus on your core competencies while we handle everything cloud
benefits.saveCostsDesc: Less than hiring one employee. Our service costs less than a single CloudSecOps professional yet delivers far greater value.
benefits.instantPowerDesc: Get a proven team that has worked together for years. No need to build your own team from scratch.
benefits.securityDesc: We implement robust security measures and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements like C5 certification.
benefits.flexibilityDesc: Choose any cloud provider (AWS, Azure, Google, OTC, STACKIT). The source code always belongs to you.
benefits.bestPracticesDesc: Our team brings innovation and best practices, ensuring you leverage the latest technologies and trends.
benefits.monitoringDesc: Round-the-clock monitoring and proactive issue resolution ensures optimal performance and immediate response.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers say about working with KumoOps
testimonials.quote1: After iits took over our project in December 2022, we saw outstanding improvements in performance and efficiency. The seamless transition and ongoing optimizations reduced our costs by 50% and increased availability to over 99.98%. The CloudSecOps team's response time is now regularly under 15 minutes.
testimonials.quote2: After the acquisition of a medium-sized German company, we found that the existing IT provider couldn't deliver the project with high quality. Within six months, iits-consulting not only completed the project successfully but also helped us build a highly secure BSI C5-compliant infrastructure.
testimonials.quote3: With the iits Telekom Cloud Team, you could immediately tell it was a well-coordinated team. Their agile and professional approach, combined with the integration of applications into a microservices structure, was impressive. They delivered a fully automated, low-maintenance infrastructure in record time.

contact.title: Talk with Our Expert
contact.description: Start with a non-binding project inquiry and let our CloudSecOps expert team provide you with comprehensive advice on your matter.
contact.readyDescription: Contact us today and together we will realize your project. Let us impress you and exceed your expectations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about KumoOps
faq.q1: A tool or technology I need isn't listed in the add-ons—do you support it?
faq.a1: In most cases, yes. We support a wide range of tools and technologies. Our default setup is container-based (e.g., Docker/Kubernetes), so we generally don't support workloads that require full Windows Server environments.
faq.q2: What happens to the source code and ownership if I cancel my KumoOps subscription?
faq.a2: You keep ownership. We build on open-source tooling and infrastructure-as-code, and during offboarding we provide you with a copy of the relevant code and configuration. After offboarding, your subscription ends—so ongoing support, updates, and improvements are no longer included.
faq.q3: How can KumoOps be cheaper than a single hire?
faq.a3: Because you're not paying for one generalist—you're getting a team. Our engineers specialize in dedicated areas and we roll out improvements across all customers. When we build a feature or harden a setup, every customer benefits, which drives the cost per customer down significantly.
faq.q4: How is KumoOps different from managed services?
faq.a4: KumoOps is a standardized product, not a highly customized cloud setup. This means lower costs, a broader feature set, and faster onboarding compared to traditional managed services—without sacrificing flexibility.
faq.q5: How is KumoOps different from managed Kubernetes?
faq.a5: KumoOps offers much more than just Kubernetes. We take care of your entire cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and all CloudSecOps aspects—so you get a complete solution, not just container orchestration.
